messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: SHORELINE CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT - INCIDENT REPORT  REPORT #: 91245 DATE: 11/12/23 TIME: 09:20 INCIDENT: Theft  INVOLVING DETECTIVES: DETECTIVE A. B. Williams DETECTIVE C. D. Thompson DETECTIVE E. F. Mitchell  SUPERVISORY: Lt. G. H. Clarkson - OPERATIONS Captain I. J. Rodriguez ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY K. Lawrence  OTHERS INVOLVED: Sgt. L. M. Gray Sgt. N. O. Dawson Technician Patricia  DETAILS: On the morning of November 12, Det. A. B. Williams received an alert about a theft that occurred at Shoreline City Mall. Preliminary information indicated that an unknown individual had broken into several stores overnight.  Security footage showed a masked individual with a distinct tattoo on their left arm. The suspect was observed breaking into three stores: Luxe Jewels, HiTech Gadgets, and Shoreline Apparel. The thefts occurred between 1:00 AM and 3:30 AM.  Technician Patricia was able to enhance the video footage, providing a clearer view of the suspect's tattoo – a blue dragon wrapped around a dagger.  Detectives Thompson and Mitchell visited the crime scenes, collecting evidence which included glass shards, a glove with potential DNA, and shoe prints.  EVIDENCE COLLECTED:  Security Footage from Shoreline City Mall Witness Statements from mall security Glass shards from broken store windows A single black glove believed to belong to the suspect Shoe prints left at HiTech Gadgets' entrance Inventory lists from the affected stores indicating stolen items SUSPECT INFORMATION: Physical Description: Approximately  medium build, distinct blue dragon tattoo on left arm.  Last Seen: Exiting Shoreline City Mall via the east entrance at approximately 3:45 AM.  STATUS: Investigation Ongoing. The evidence collected has been sent to the forensics division for further analysis. The tattoo's design is being cross-referenced with known criminal databases to potentially identify the suspect. Additional patrols have been set up around commercial areas in the city as a precaution.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DETECTIVE A. B. Williams Officer Context: Received an alert about a theft that occurred at Shoreline City Mall. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: DETECTIVE C. D. Thompson Officer Context: Visited the crime scenes and collected evidence pertaining to the thefts at Shoreline City Mall. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: DETECTIVE E. F. Mitchell Officer Context: Visited the crime scenes and collected evidence pertaining to the thefts at Shoreline City Mall. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Lt. G. H. Clarkson Officer Context: Mentioned in the supervisory context, but specific duties or actions related to this case are not detailed in the report. Officer Role: Lieutenant  Officer Name: Captain I. J. Rodriguez Officer Context: Mentioned in the supervisory context, but specific duties or actions related to this case are not detailed in the report. Officer Role: Captain  Officer Name: ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY K. Lawrence Officer Context: Mentioned in the supervisory context, but specific duties or actions related to this case are not detailed in the report. Officer Role: Assistant Chief Deputy  Officer Name: Sgt. L. M. Gray Officer Context: Mentioned among the Others Involved but specific duties or actions related to this case are not detailed in the report. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Sgt. N. O. Dawson Officer Context: Mentioned among the Others Involved but specific duties or actions related to this case are not detailed in the report. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Technician Patricia Officer Context: Enhanced the video footage to provide a clearer view of the suspect's distinctive tattoo, aiding in the investigation. Officer Role: Technician
